name: arty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
being or wishing to seem very interested in everything connected with art and artists: She hangs out with a lot of arty types.

trying to be like artists or dress and live in the style typical of artists, esp. while lacking any real understanding of art or the work of artists: an arty crowd
